title: Earth Cafe Marrakech II
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Turkish, Moroccan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian food comprise 50%+ of the menu, and much of the fresh produce comes directly from the owner's farm. There are also 2 pure veg branches of Earth Cafe - one in Marrakech, one in Essaouira. Directions: From centre of the Medina, the Jemaa el Fna Square, find Rue Riad Zitoun el Kdim, walk down this road for 10 minutes, look for a basic white sign with black writing, 'Earth Cafe' on a peach-orange wall, and the restaurant entrance is immediately down a minor alley, to the left off Rue Riad Zitoun el Kdim - go upstairs.
streetAddress: N 1, Derb Nakouss, Riad Zitoun Jedid, Medina
